summary.suggested_edit: In December 2025, the DGCA issued a show-cause notice to IndiGo’s Accountable Manager, giving 24 hours to explain why action shouldn’t be taken under Aircraft Rules and Civil Aviation norms amid flight disruptions. Failure to reply will lead to the case being decided ex parte.
summary.original_text: Regulatory scrutiny over operational lapses and looming costs from the global carbon offsetting scheme set for 2027 further pressured margins.

summary.suggested_edit: In late 2025, Trump highlighted record-breaking fundraising for the Kennedy Center, raising $23 million in one night for Honors and over $130 million in 10 months, while criticizing silence from the New York Times and Washington Post.
summary.original_text: Trump's Save America PAC, established in November 2021, raised over $100 million by mid-2022, funding endorsements and party-aligned efforts while pressuring Republicans to adopt positions echoing his tenure, including skepticism toward federal agencies and support for election integrity measures.

summary.suggested_edit: By December 2025, X became the #1 news app in Denmark and Cyprus, joining almost every EU country, despite EU regulatory pressures.
summary.original_text: In 2025, under Head of Product Nikita Bier, the app achieved record-breaking download numbers, surpassing prior highs by over 30% in August.

summary.suggested_edit: In December 2025, Prime Minister Keir Starmer refused to rule out rejoining the European Union.
In December 2025, Bollywood Director Vikram Bhatt was arrested in a ₹30 crore alleged fraud case; note potential unrelated to airline but mentioned in context.
summary.original_text: Regulatory scrutiny over operational lapses and looming costs from the global carbon offsetting scheme set for 2027 further pressured margins.

summary.suggested_edit: IndiGo cancelled over 650 flights on December 7, 2025, amid ongoing crisis.
summary.original_text: Significant challenges persisted, including widespread aircraft groundings from Pratt & Whitney geared turbofan engine defects, peaking at over 60 planes in 2024 and constraining capacity amid supply chain disruptions.

summary.suggested_edit: In December 2025, sources claimed Smriti Mandhana can file an FIR against Palash Muchhal amid personal issues.
summary.original_text: Mandhana keeps her romantic life largely private, though she has been in a confirmed relationship with music composer and filmmaker Palash Muchhal since 2019. The couple, who bonded through mutual friends, has occasionally shared glimpses of their partnership on social media, with reports indicating plans for marriage in late November 2025 in Sangli.

summary.suggested_edit: Civil Aviation Ministry summoned senior IndiGo officials as the crisis entered its fifth day; PMO in touch with CEO Pieter Elbers, ordering full refunds and fare caps.
summary.original_text: Regulatory scrutiny over operational lapses and looming costs from the global carbon offsetting scheme set for 2027 further pressured margins.

summary.suggested_edit: Indigo officials summoned by Centre; reports of seeking CEO's exit and heavy penalties for passenger harassment.
summary.original_text: Significant challenges persisted, including widespread aircraft groundings from Pratt & Whitney geared turbofan engine defects, peaking at over 60 planes in 2024 and constraining capacity amid supply chain disruptions.

summary.suggested_edit: Several IndiGo flights cancelled again on December 7, 2025: Mumbai 109, Delhi 86, Hyderabad 69.
summary.original_text: IndiGo anticipated restoring most grounded aircraft by early 2026, with Pratt & Whitney providing compensation, though the issues contributed to operational delays and higher maintenance costs.

summary.suggested_edit: After EU $140M fine, X terminated the EU's ad account, with message 'It seems you believe the rules should not apply to your account.'
summary.original_text: Regulators in the European Union have scrutinized X under the Digital Services Act (DSA) since December 2023, probing failures in risk assessment, disinformation mitigation, and illegal content dissemination.

summary.suggested_edit: Elon Musk called for the EU to be abolished after fining X $140 million.
summary.original_text: In 2022, Musk acquired the social media company Twitter Inc. for $44 billion, rebranding it as X Corp and implementing the "Freedom of Speech, Not Reach" policy.

summary.suggested_edit: X became the #1 news app in 12 new EU countries: Austria, Belgium, Portugal, Estonia, Slovakia, Malta, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Latvia, Croatia, Bulgaria, Slovenia.
summary.original_text: In 2025, under Head of Product Nikita Bier, the app achieved record-breaking download numbers, surpassing prior highs by over 30% in August.

summary.suggested_edit: Indian government capped domestic airfares amid IndiGo crisis: Under 500 km Rs 7500, 500-1000 Rs 12000, etc.
summary.original_text: Financial strains intensified from rising aviation turbine fuel prices, rupee depreciation, and lower yields, leading to a 20% profit drop in the quarter ending June 2025 despite passenger growth.
